author: nspiegelberg
msg: Fixed small off-by-one error from previous checkin

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Currently, outstanding split requests are handled like a FIFO
queue.  This can stall the split pipeline in cases where a major
compaction must be requested before the split or a daughter region is
load balanced, creating a non-local major compaction.  Switching from a
queue to a scan should mitigate these bottlenecks.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Because a split requires a compaction first, waiting for the
daughter regions was taking a long time.  This is mostly because the
split is stalled in the compaction queue.  Allow multiple split
requests to be outstanding to speed this process up

author: nspiegelberg
msg: fsWriteSize (size of append to HLog) metric wasn't getting recorded correctly.
Tested this on my dev cluster.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Currently, the hlog metrics don't show the real min/max.  It
looks higher in OpenTSBD because you see avg for the RS with the highest
metric.  Refactor hlog code to give us actual min max data so we can
